fomod.Name: Estrus Chaurus Spider Addon
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Requirements: Estrus Chaurus+ v4.21 and its prerequisites http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1033-estrus-chaurus/
This is a port of http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1938-estrus-chaurus-v394-spider-addon/ It's not a replacer but an addon, so it is compatible with EC+ v4.21 and, maybe, future versions.
This mod changes breeder effect of EstrusChaurus.esp by adding HasSpell check it so that you can only get pregnant by either a spider or a chaurus at a time.
